title: Workshop on Developing Self-Regulated Learning Strategies for Online Graduate Education

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational educational theory and experience in online learning environments
context.additional_context: A cohort primarily composed of pre-service or in-service teachers, with insufficient experience in self-reflective learning based on mixed-methods research.

learning_goals: Learners can identify three or more self-regulated learning strategies in online environments and develop actionable plans to apply them in real educational contexts.
Learners can design a framework to analyze the effectiveness of self-regulated learning support measures using mixed research methodologies (qualitative + quantitative).
Through co-regulated learning with peer teachers, learners can derive five core elements to consider when designing lifelong learning environments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
